org.apache.taverna.activities.spreadsheet

Interface SpreadsheetReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CSVSpreadsheetReader, ExcelSpreadsheetReader, ODFSpreadsheetReader

    public interface SpreadsheetReader
    Interface for reading a spreadsheet from an input stream.
    Author:
    David Withers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void read(InputStream inputStream, Range rowRange, Range columnRange, boolean ignoreBlankRows, SpreadsheetRowProcessor rowProcessor)
      Reads an InputStream and passes spreadsheet cell data values, row by row, to the rowProcessor.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        void read(InputStream inputStream,
          Range rowRange,
          Range columnRange,
          boolean ignoreBlankRows,
          SpreadsheetRowProcessor rowProcessor)
   throws SpreadsheetReadException
        Reads an InputStream and passes spreadsheet cell data values, row by row, to the rowProcessor.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the stream to read
        rowProcessor - the rowProcessor to write rows of data values to
        rowRange - the rows to read
        columnRange - the columns to read
        ignoreBlankRows - whether to ignore blank rows
        Throws:
        SpreadsheetReadException - if there's an error reading the stream or the stream is not a valid spreadsheet
